To knowledge , report different reaction autonomic nervous system acupuncture far-infrared illumination rare now.Therefore , study investigate different change autonomic nervous system Ryodoraku value 12 source acupoints heart rate viability ( HRV ) acupuncture far-infrared ray illumination apply CV12 acupoint .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult volunteer , male female , age 20 40 Neurological physical examination without abnormal function Farinfrared ray illumination without allergic reaction contra indication The participant explain objective study , agree accept test sign letter consent People le 20 year age 40 year Women pregnant lactate People mental behavioral anomaly could follow researcher People pacemaker People suffer serious disease myocardial infarction , heart failure , serious arrhythmia , hypertension , diabetes , autoimmune disease , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , kidney failure , liver cirrhosis cancer People accept acupuncture moxibustion week , take drug treatment People suffer limb edema serious skin diseases People excessive obesity ( body mass index , BMI > 30 ) People sign letter consent
